title: How many pieces did Sergei Prokofiev compose? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can look that up on wikipedia you know. List of compositions by Sergei Prokofiev - Wikipedia Even so, I guess it’s a matter of opinion because should you count his opus 2 ( 4 Etudes for Piano) as one piece or four pieces? Same problem with opuses 3 & 4. Then there is opus 12 - “10 Pieces for Piano”- and so on……. Anyway, does it really matter? He was obviously a very busy boy. Good for him.
